name: Barakon
overview: Released as part of the Vertical Scrolling SEUCK Compo 2010 and as part of the Shoot 'Em Up Destruction Set 3. The country was in turmoil. A dangerous dermagogue played on public fears in order to get elected.... and so Stalin became the country's first female president. She quickly turned into the country's first dictator in a fit of madness she started a great war which laid waste to the country. Only one man can defeat the dictator and restore democracy. Barakon - a fighting cyborg created by renegade scientists. Help Barakon fight against the militia and bring back peace to his country before it falls completely out of control.
